summary: Are you a ranger? Want a cool ebony and leather armour? We have got you covered. This is an armour mashup from some Witcher stuff. Ebony strength light ranger armour.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/6gN0A5y.png[/img]

[b][color=#e69138][color=red][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][/url][color=#cc4125][size=6][b][/b][/size][/color][center][color=#cc4125][b][size=6]Mod works as intended, so don't expect any updates.[/size]
[b][size=4]I don't develop old mods any more.
[/size][/b]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/elianorapwnsu][img]http://i.imgur.com/267fYFk.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/c/Elianora][img]http://i.imgur.com/bGTVC9s.png[/img][/url][/b][/color][/center][/b][/color][/color][/b]_____________________________________________________________________________________

 [b][color=#76a5af][size=4]:: REQUIREMENTS ::
[/size][/color][/b]
- Skyrim.esm

[b][color=#76a5af][size=4]:: GENERAL ::
[/size][/color][/b]
Mod adds an armour and matching gloves to the game.
They are Ebony armour level in DT, and can be crafted at the forge under Ebony, if you have the perk.

[youtube]cyPzFZZftAU[/youtube]

It's not my meshes or models, I was just given a task to implement them to Skyrim in CK. So I did :3

To keep the boots with the cool spike things, the boots had to be left intact with the cuirass, so I amped up the armours rating a bit (Ebony armour + Ebony boots combined). You cannot wear boots with this armour. 

[b][color=#cc4125][size=5]PLEASE DO NOT SEND ME REQUESTS OR COMMENTS ABOUT EDITING THE ARMOUR MODELS. I have no such skills.[/size][/color][/b]

Stats and material requirements: Check the image section.

[s]There is no hood, helmet or circlet. I recommend using the Ranger Hood from Immersive Armours.
[/s]Now comes with a hood. Beast races supported.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/3jezrnc.png[/img]

[b][color=#76a5af][size=4]:: CREDITS ::
[/size][/color][/b]
PaulMcGann for the concept and design
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1735131/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Davjes[/url] for the editing and mashing
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53435/?]Steelsnake12 for the original version of Monster Hunter Armor[/url] 
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/5944828-kensmalice/]Victor B Hurt[/url] for textures
Elianora: CK magic and minor texture alteration

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12015/?]H4lfD3ad for rigging the hood and the Better Shrouded armor retexture[/url]

All these assets are used with permission.

Looking for the Witcher 3 set? [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53435/]Here's the Monster Hunter armour[/url]

[b][color=#76a5af][size=3]:: Thanks ::[/size][/color][/b]
Jaden for non-ENB screenshots[/center]
author: Elianora - Davjes - Viktor B - Steelsnake12 - PaulMcGann
